zgpLowNvmTable.h File Reference

The header file describes the NVM table specific APIs from low zgp. More...

#include <zgpCommon.h>
#include <sysQueue.h>
#include <zgpLow.h>

  ZGP_PROXY_TABLE = 0x0,
  ZGP_SINK_TABLE = 0x1,
  ZGP_UNINIT_TABLE_TYPE = 0x3
}
enum  _ZgpReadOperationStatus_t {
  ENTRY_NOT_AVAILABLE = 0x0,
  ACTIVE_ENTRY_AVAILABLE = 0x1
}
enum  _ZpTableUpdateAction_t {
  UPDATE_ENTRY = 0x1,
  REPLACE_ENTRY = 0x2,
  REMOVE_PAIRING_ENTRY = 0x3
}
enum  _zgpCommunicationMode_t {
  FULL_UNICAST = 0x00,
  DERIVED_GROUPCAST = 0x01,
  PRECOMMISSIONED_GROUPCAST = 0x02,
  LIGHTWEIGHT_UNICAST = 0x03,

Detailed Description

The header file describes the NVM table specific APIs from low zgp.

ZGP_TableType_t  tableType

To reset all the parameters of the given entry to init value.

uint8_t ZGPL_TotalNonEmptyEntries ( bool  isProxyTable)

To fetch the total no. of non-empty entries. This is mainly used by high sink/proxy while sending sink/proxy table response.

Parameters:
[in]-isProxyTable - true for proxy table false for sink table
Returns:
No of Non Empty Sink Table Entries
bool ZGPL_AddOrUpdateTableEntryOnNvm ( void *  entryPtr,
ZGP_TableUpdateAction_t  action,
ZGP_TableType_t  tableType 
)

To add/update proxy/sink entry on NVM.

Parameters:
[in]-entryPtr - pointer to the entry action - to be performed on the entry tableType - proxy or sink entry
Returns:
true for successful operation false otherwise

ZGP_GpdId_t *  gpdId,
uint8_t  endPoint 
)

To read a proxy/sink entry from NVm.

Parameters:
[in]-entryPtr - entry to be filled tableOperationField - filter fields for read operation gpdId - pointer to address info endPoint - GPD end point

bool  isUpdateOperation

To read/update frameCounter.

To check whether pairing info in the sink entry is empty or not.

Parameters:

Returns:
true - Pairing Info empty false - Pairing Infor non-empty
